config.rule: MUST trigger 'Transfer' when tokens are transferred, including zero value transfers
function balanceOf(address _owner) public view returns (uint256 balance)
The number of decimal places the token can be divided into. This is used to define the smallest unit of the token for display and transaction purposes.
